text: Stardust Memories is a 1980 comedy drama movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and starring Charlotte Rumping, Daniel Stern, Sharon Stone, Jessica Harper, and Cynthia Gibb. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1980 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen
title: Stardust Memories
